Class DatabaseService

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class DatabaseService
extends Service

Started and stopped by server framework. Manages database connection.

Author:
FRMQ36 Revision history ------------------------------------------------------------ $Log: DatabaseService.java,v $ Revision 1.3 2012/03/01 21:40:56 cmb004 issue #17556 Add a new exception type (FatalExeption) as well as some additional exception handling in the service launcher to deal with fatal vs. non-fatal errors. The main Service initialize method will now be able to throw an exception. Database Service will validate the connection pool handle during initialization and throw a FatalException if the connection pool won't connect. Revision 1.2 2011/12/01 22:29:32 jordan issue #17332 Update comments Revision 1.1 2011/12/01 21:41:09 jordan issue #17332 Database service ------------------------------------------------------------
